mapper.sql: DeviceNo, DeviceName, DeviceType, DeviceVender, DeviceModel, IP, Port, DeviceSN, DeviceCode, MacCode, UserName, UserPass, Online, NetState, Enabled, IOStatus, DoorName, CreateDate, DeviceUse, ChannelNo, AreaID
select res.* from (select @num := @num+1 tindex, tmp.* from (

) tmp , (SELECT @num := 0) var order by deviceno asc) res where 1=1
and res.tindex >= (CONVERT(#{curpage},SIGNED)-1) * CONVERT(#{pagesize},SIGNED)+1 and res.tindex <= CONVERT(#{curpage},SIGNED) * CONVERT(#{pagesize},SIGNED)

foreach.if: insert into deviceplat (DeviceNo, DeviceName, DeviceType, DeviceVender, DeviceModel, IP, Port, DeviceSN,DeviceCode, MacCode, UserName, UserPass, Online, NetState, Enabled, IOStatus, DoorName, DeviceUse) select #{item.deviceno}, #{item.devicename}, #{item.devicetype}, #{item.devicevender}, #{item.devicemodel}, #{item.ip}, #{item.port}, #{item.devicesn},#{item.devicecode}, #{item.maccode}, #{item.username}, #{item.userpass}, #{item.online}, #{item.netstate}, #{item.enabled}, #{item.iostatus}, #{item.doorname}, #{item.deviceuse} where not exists(select 1 from deviceplat where deviceno=#{item.deviceno} or devicesn=#{item.devicesn})

update deviceplat set DeviceName = #{item.devicename}, DeviceType = #{item.devicetype}, DeviceVender = #{item.devicevender}, DeviceModel = #{item.devicemodel}, IP = #{item.ip}, Port = #{item.port}, DeviceSN = #{item.devicesn}, DeviceCode = #{item.devicecode}, MacCode = #{item.maccode}, UserName = #{item.username}, UserPass = #{item.userpass}, Online = #{item.online}, NetState = #{item.netstate}, Enabled = #{item.enabled}, IOStatus = #{item.iostatus}, DoorName = #{item.doorname}, DeviceUse = #{item.deviceuse} where DeviceNo = #{item.deviceno}

mapper.insert: insert into deviceplat (DeviceNo, DeviceName, DeviceType, DeviceVender, DeviceModel, IP, Port, DeviceSN,DeviceCode, MacCode, UserName, UserPass, Online, NetState, Enabled, IOStatus, DoorName, CreateDate, DeviceUse, ChannelNo, AreaID) values (#{deviceno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devicetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devicevender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devicemodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devicesn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{devicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userpass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{online,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{netstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{iostatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{doorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deviceuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{channelno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update deviceplat
DeviceName = #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeviceType = #{devicetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeviceVender = #{devicevender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeviceModel = #{devicemodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeviceSN = #{devicesn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DeviceCode = #{devicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MacCode = #{maccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserPass = #{userpass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Online = #{online,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NetState = #{netstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IOStatus = #{iostatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DoorName = #{doorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DeviceUse = #{deviceuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ChannelNo = #{channelno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
AreaID = #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where DeviceNo = #{deviceno,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update deviceplat set DeviceName = #{devicename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeviceType = #{devicetype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeviceVender = #{devicevender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeviceModel = #{devicemodel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Port = #{port,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeviceSN = #{devicesn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DeviceCode = #{devicecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MacCode = #{maccode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserPass = #{userpass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Online = #{online,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NetState = #{netstate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IOStatus = #{iostatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DoorName = #{doorname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CreateDate = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DeviceUse = #{deviceuse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ChannelNo = #{channelno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, AreaID = #{areaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DeviceNo = #{deviceno,jdbcType=INTEGER}
